properties.name: AlarmName
properties.description: The name for the alarm. Specify the name of an existing alarm to update, and overwrite the previous configuration of the alarm.

type.description: The name for the alarm. Specify the name of an existing alarm to update, and overwrite the previous configuration of the alarm.

properties.name: ComparisonOperator
properties.description: The arithmetic operation to use when comparing the specified statistic to the threshold. The specified statistic value is used as the first operand.

type.description: The arithmetic operation to use when comparing the specified statistic to the threshold. The specified statistic value is used as the first operand.

properties.name: ContactProtocols
properties.description: The contact protocols to use for the alarm, such as Email, SMS (text messaging), or both.

type.description: The contact protocols to use for the alarm, such as Email, SMS (text messaging), or both.

properties.name: DatapointsToAlarm
properties.description: The number of data points that must be not within the specified threshold to trigger the alarm. If you are setting an "M out of N" alarm, this value (datapointsToAlarm) is the M.

type.description: The number of data points that must be not within the specified threshold to trigger the alarm. If you are setting an "M out of N" alarm, this value (datapointsToAlarm) is the M.

properties.name: EvaluationPeriods
properties.description: The number of most recent periods over which data is compared to the specified threshold. If you are setting an "M out of N" alarm, this value (evaluationPeriods) is the N.

type.description: The number of most recent periods over which data is compared to the specified threshold. If you are setting an "M out of N" alarm, this value (evaluationPeriods) is the N.

properties.name: MetricName
properties.description: The name of the metric to associate with the alarm.

type.description: The name of the metric to associate with the alarm.

properties.name: MonitoredResourceName
properties.description: The validation status of the SSL/TLS certificate.

type.description: The validation status of the SSL/TLS certificate.

properties.name: NotificationEnabled
properties.description: Indicates whether the alarm is enabled. Notifications are enabled by default if you don't specify this parameter.

type.description: Indicates whether the alarm is enabled. Notifications are enabled by default if you don't specify this parameter.

properties.name: NotificationTriggers
properties.description: The alarm states that trigger a notification.

type.description: The alarm states that trigger a notification.

properties.name: Threshold
properties.description: The value against which the specified statistic is compared.

type.description: The value against which the specified statistic is compared.

properties.name: TreatMissingData
properties.description: Sets how this alarm will handle missing data points.

type.description: Sets how this alarm will handle missing data points.

properties.name: State
properties.description: The current state of the alarm.

type.description: The current state of the alarm.
